definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to get sth done once and for all

to love ease and comfort and hate work (idiom)
to wait at one's ease for the exhausted enemy/to nurture one's strength and bide one's time (idiom)

sentences.english: Chapter III is the grammatical analysis of"Yizhoushu"Verbs.

sentences.english: I'm afraid the hOtel's full on those dates.
sentences.chinese: 那幾天逸旅館恐怕都客滿了。

sentences.english: I also modified the code in an attempt to coerce escape analysis into working.
sentences.chinese: 我也修改過代碼，希望可以強制逸出分析運行。

sentences.english: And voices singing out of empty cisterns and exhausted wells.
sentences.chinese: 以及逸自空及枯井的歌聲。

sentences.english: A stoma is an opening through which carbon dioxide goes in and oxygen and water vapor escape.
sentences.chinese: 氣孔是二氧化碳進入而氧氣和水蒸氣逸出的開口。

sentences.english: Instead, they are better at stopping the virus getting out.
sentences.chinese: 相反，它們阻止病毒從體內逸出的作用更大。

sentences.english: Everyone cheering for Luo Yifei return.
sentences.chinese: 大家都在歡呼，迎接羅逸菲的歸來。
